scripts.version:bump: pnpm -r run version:bump prerelease --force && pnpm -r up "@stoked-cenv/*" && git add package.json packages/cli/package.json packages/ui/package.json packages/lib/package.json packages/cdk/package.json pnpm-lock.yaml && git commit -m "push bump packages" && git push && pnpm version prerelease && git push
scripts.publish:bump: pnpm run version:bump && pnpm --filter "@stoked-cenv/*" run publish:bump --publish-branch $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)
